media.caption: Whitney Houston performing on her My Love is Your Love Tour in Hamburg.

text.headline:
Christianity, Capitalism and White Supremacy - A Timeline
1455 - 2023
text.text: Documenting the history of White Supremacy and it's ties to Christianity and Capitalism.

text.headline: Romanus Pontifex of 1455
text.text: This papal bull legally granted Portugal the right to enslave any and all people they encounter south of Cape Bojador, on the coast of Western Sahara.

text.headline: Julie Hayden
text.text: Julia Hayden, was an American seventeen-year-old Black school teacher murdered by members of the White Man's League within days of starting a teaching position at a school for Black children in Tennessee.
